ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt

Class AbstractMAC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.crypt.AbstractMAC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MAC
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HMAC

    public abstract class AbstractMAC
extends java.lang.Object
implements MAC
    Abstract MAC class that provides the generic calls to tag() and verify() when the optional parameters are not specified.
